public class swappingoftwonumbers 
{

	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a=1;
		int b=2;
		int temp=a;
		a=temp;
		a=b;
		b=temp;
		System.out.println("after swapping");
		System.out.println("a=:"+a);
		System.out.println("b=:"+b);

	}

}
